storyInfo: Horn loses another comrade and decides to rescue all the remaining soldiers who have been taken prisoners by the Sarkaz. At the same time, Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps also plan their own operation to rescue Messenger Heidi Thomson, who has been captured by the Sarkaz.

attributes.content: Boss, you were right. We lost them.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Those rebels... Crafty little sand beasts, the lot of them. Just five seconds, and it's like they all burrowed into the sand without a trace.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sure enough, and that's why we shouldn't waste our energy on them.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Guard your position well, until they poke their heads out of their holes again.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Sure. You're the boss.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Looks like you found yourself a bunch of loyal subordinates, 'Boss.'
They think it'll pay dividends. It's good for morale.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: They trust you too. I can tell. It's far more than what a mercenary should afford another mercenary.
Just goes to show how effective Manfred's plan is.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You think real highly of him. I almost forgot. You two are practically brothers from another mother these days, right? Just look at the mansion he gave you. The den alone is larger than your old backyard.
It was a count's estate. I killed its previous owner.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Don't tell me that's weighing on your conscience.
He was having afternoon tea at the time... His wife and their three children were sitting right in front of him.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Sure, this is nothing like the kind of work we used to take, but you're the one who agreed to the job. Nothing to mourn when our consciences died so long ago.
Then let's not ask these questions. Whatever it is you want to know, just take a look for yourself. Not like you don't know already.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Is you being under a lot of stress supposed to somehow make me feel better?
Whatever. Let's talk about something else. It's not the time for us to find comfort in each other. I'm here because I have some advice for you—Pay attention to what's under your feet.
You mean...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Mercenaries aren't all that trustworthy.
If you don't pay attention to the shadows when you walk, your efforts might just be all for naught.
Is that all you came here for?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: No, that's not all.
What I really wanted to say is—After drifting around for so long, she's on the road.
Are our men in position?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Yes, all at that place per the Sarkaz's orders.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Don't be daft. I'm not talking about what the Sarkaz want us to do.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Captain, are we really going to start this operation tonight? Are you sure we won't...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: You trying to ask if we'll fall into Manfred's trap?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Do you think I'm so stupid that I can't tell what he's trying to do?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: No, of course not... I wouldn't dare to...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: He's trying to test me, and I'll let him test me.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Our men are his to order around... but he doesn't know how many of us there are.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: So, we still have to be the Sarkaz's gatekeepers, then?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I hate putting it that way. It makes it sound as though we're the Sarkaz's... the Sarkaz's...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Gah, whatever. We just have to bear with it today. Once we're done with this last thing, we'll leave Londinium straight away.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: W-Will we really? That's wonderful news!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Ever since I was a kid... I... I've always hated Londinium. My parents both came to this place and never went back...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: This city eats people!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Right, I don't like it either. Have you ever seen another city like this? So many plates, so many tall towers, and so many sewers?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Every time I smell that stench... The smell of grease on the nobles' dining tables, it makes me want to puke.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: And now we can finally leave.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Get the word out, and put on your best performance tonight. Do not give Manfred anything he can use against us.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: And I want the ten best fighters to come with me.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: As for you, I want you to tail Manfred... You saw where he was heading, right?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Yes, Captain.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Tonight, I'll rescue our 'spy.'
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I've stayed here in Londinium for so long, I have to at least get one thing done before I can go home with my mind at ease, right?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I... I won't let our leader down again.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Horn, you're back!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: I am. Where's Robben?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The team got back a while ago.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Good. Did they find any medicine? Let me check on Salley.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: There's... There's no need.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What are you talking about?! Do you mean Salley...?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I still have to see him.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Victoria has lost another fine soldier.
A little girl has lost her father.
How many more must we lose before we finally see the end of this tragedy?
What was Salley's girl's name again? Was it Erin? Elisa? If memory serves, his family lived in County Ascarat.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Blake, pack up his belongings, please. Once the war is over, we'll pay his family a visit.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But... he didn't leave anything behind.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Nothing at all?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No, Blake... At the very least, he left a story. We have to go on this journey still. His daughter will want to hear his story.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I will tell her that, even in our darkest hour, her father never gave in to suffering.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Right. I'll come with you, Horn. Once the war is over.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Also, I have a message for you. From Salley.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What... did he say?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: He said—'Sorry, Lieutenant, but you must live on.'
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: He apologized to me.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: He did. And, I understood him. We all did.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: As soldiers, we all considered that we could die out there somewhere, one day.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: But after we saw all that, Salley... No, all of us understood what's far scarier.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Take a look at the state of Londinium. It's our home, but it's become a prison.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Is dying an honorable death too much to ask for?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: It shouldn't be.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Indeed, but that's the truth now.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We all know that well, but... we... we want you to keep marching down this road, because you gave us hope.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Horn... You didn't have to carry all our hopes on your back. It's too much for one person.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: It's harder... to live, huh?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Ha... Looks like I owe her an apology.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Who's 'her?'
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: A fine Victorian soldier, just like the rest of you.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: She... Let's not talk about this now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Tell everyone we don't have time to mourn.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Did you find out where they're keeping our people?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: There's a high chance.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If the information I got turns out to be correct, the Sarkaz will move them tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I... I was going to ask what you think.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You don't have to ask. Just give us the order!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Very well, then. We will begin as soon as the sun sets.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I've marked the most probable locations on the map. Any thoughts?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: There are... eight spots?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even with our operators, it'll be hard to check all these places in two days.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Unfortunately, all eight fulfill the requirements of a temporary prison.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: There are no settlements near any of them, which means that it's difficult for news to get in and out.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: They're all located near the highway that leads to Central Londinium, which facilitates the Sarkaz fighters' movement around the city.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: And... none of them are connected to the plate we are in.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Did the Sarkaz commander figure out you're operating underground?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He's a smart man. We mustn't underestimate him.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Then... If this is where they're keeping prisoners, shouldn't there be a massive security detail guarding the place?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We thought about that too.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Unfortunately, even though our recon team managed to track the Sarkaz's movement in each plate, they haven't found any openings.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: An abandoned factory. They say it used to make candy... And don't get the wrong idea. That is just what the civilians in the industrial districts usually call it.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: What they actually refined is an organic compound called Loxic Kohl. It's packaged like sweets for children, so everyone's come to call it 'candy'.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: A candy factory? Sounds familiar...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Make this our top priority in the search.;I think we're pretty close to the answer.

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, may I know why?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: We may know who owns it.

attributes.content: Ah, of course. You mean Mr. Thomas?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Thomas has been working with the Sarkaz, right? He said he saw the Sarkaz using his factory for some shady business, and he was almost silenced because of it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not to mention... he has some information that Dublinn wanted too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: All the factions opposing the Sarkaz want it...;It's something the Sarkaz don't want anyone to know.

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Tell Feist that this factory is our prime objective.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Harmo, keep working on the move. We will keep that option open to us too.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: What is it, Lawrence?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The recon team is back. They ran into some Sarkaz mercenaries aboveground.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Casualties...?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Four injured, and one... captured.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Sorry everyone, the meeting ends here. I need to take a look.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, what are you doing? We just got your wounds bandaged!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: No... I have something I must tell the commander.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Did you find her...?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Yes, we got news from Lady Golding. She's still at the school in the northern residential district, and she's safe...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But they were ambushed by the Sarkaz during a social gathering two days ago.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: And the Messenger lady... was taken prisoner.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Wait a moment, please—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is the Messenger you are referring to the one who requested you to rendezvous with Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: The lady who helped us get into Victoria.;She gathered lots of information on Victoria.;Kal'tsit's old friend.

attributes.content: Right... That's her.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Amiya, Dr.{@nickname}, our rescue operation has been moved up.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: She's very important to the Self-Salvation Corps. She holds a lot of information, and this might even affect our evacuation operation.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Yes, I understand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's irreplaceable to Rhodes Island too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: This will be our first joint operation.

attributes.content: Good. I have faith that Rhodes Island will help us rescue our imprisoned Messenger from the Sarkaz—
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Our strongest warrior, our most important ally, and our most trusted friend, Lady Heidi Thomson.
attributes.name: Clovisia
